experience.title: Customer Service Representative
responsibilities: Assisted customers with product inquiries and located items on the sales floor.
Processed transactions at the point of sale and maintained cash drawer accuracy.
Resolved basic customer complaints and escalated complex issues to management.

experience.title: Delivery Driver
responsibilities: Transported food orders to residential and commercial addresses within a set timeframe.
Maintained a clean and reliable vehicle for daily operations.
Handled cash and credit card payments at the door while providing professional service.

metadata.experience_level: No prior experience or research done for job field.
